news.title: Decentralize the DigiByte Blockchain by Deploying a Node on the ThreeFold Grid

news.content:
Today we are happy to share with you some news from our partnership with the DigiByte Foundation ü§ù how to decentralize the DigiByte Network by deploying a DigiByte Node on ThreeFold Grid!

DigiByte Foundation's Rudy Bouwman joins ThreeFold's Weynand Kuijpers to discuss what it all means and how to deploy.

üëÄ Watch the full video here.

If you're interested in deploying a DigiByte Node on the ThreeFold Grid, please fill out this quick form and we will get in touch.

More to come from DigiByte Foundation and ThreeFold ‚Äì this is only the beginning! üåÖ
news.excerpt: Today we are happy to share with you some news from our partnership with the DigiByte Foundation!

previous.title: DigiByte integrates with ThreeFold‚Äôs decentralized Grid
previous.excerpt: The DigiByte Foundation and the ThreeFold Foundation are aligned ‚Äì both focused on values, working towards their visions and missions in creating a truly decentralized, equal, and sustainable world that empowers humanity.

next.title: DigiThree Labs is live!
next.excerpt: The DigiThree website is now live! Dig in to see what we're bringing to the world together with DigiCorp.
